text:
I actually graduated in 2023, there have been lots of gangsters and bullying in this school, my form teachers were also quite mean, always like to bully and accuse me of doing the wrong things for no reason.

Overall, just don’t go, glad I already graduated, probably one of the worst primary schools in Singapore

P.S watch out for Mrs Noble and Mdm Sharifah should you be in this school

This school have no self control over their student whatsoever and even have poor education system, as their student cause a havoc even outside of  school ground. There was a Groups of students from this school in the bus i took they are all hoarding the seats by placing their bags in the empty seat and despite seeing a lot of people trying to find seat they don’t bother moving their bags. Not only that, they were all acting like a bunch of monkeys and making so much noises as well as eating candies in the bus even though there a rule that say no eating in the bus. From this case I can tell that this school have poor education system for the students as they don’t even know simple manner. Why are primary school kids even allowed to run out of the school without adult supervision?
The teachers will gossip about students and for p6 my yr they ise green screen for ezlink thing and its vv ugly
My old school… … 1 I’m 13 and when I went it was a great school… .. hope it continues to be a top schools the photo is of 2023 grad batch

To parents whose children got bullied, can you share your stories with the Straits Times or Lian He Wan Bao? Especially with the recent news of school bullying, I’m curious and concerned to know what really happened as planning to enrol my child in this school.
